name: Twin Cherries necklace
description:
Sugar-sweet '50s homemaker or sassy rockabilly vibe... style it your own way.

Twin enamelled vibrant red cherries and a green leaf pendant swing from a silver-plated chain.

Chain is approximately 43cm in length and the cherry pendant is almost 2.5cm long and 2.5cm wide

name: Hearbreaker bracelet
description:
Sweet and deadly.

Roses and swords... but swords with a heart on the pommel!

Shimmering pearlescence and silver-plated sass on a chain.

Chain measures approximately 20cm and the pendant is 3cm in length and 3cm at its widest point.

name: Del Rio dress
description: What a burst of sunshine this dress is! Beautifully vibrant Mexican-inspired floral embroidery stands out like jewels on the black rayon dress. The embroidery highlights are across the back yoke and the shoulders, as well as forming a pretty girdle around the waist. The gathered skirt falls to around knee-length and has pockets hidden in the side seams. A dress Rita Hayworth would have looked amazing in! Sizes: A size - B to 107cm W79cm B size - B to 110.5cm W81cm C size - B to 111.5cm W84cm

name: Red Forever Knot belt
description:
You'll love this. You'll love this knot.

A lovely knotwork belt in fire engine red.

This belt comes in two sizes - pick yours according to how long you would like the ties to be at the back.

The design is 34cm across.

In A Size the ties are 34cm each side for a total of 102cm
In B Size the ties are 40cm each side for a total of 114cm

There's a slight stretch to the material and to the design, but negligible - and too much stretch won't achieve a great look - or comfortable wear.

name: Obi belt
description:
The perfect way to finish an outfit off - the stylish and simple Obi belt.

Made of a polished stretch cotton, the Obi belt measures 8cm in the centre, tapering off at the edges.

The belt is 62cm across, with a 69cm tie on each side, giving you the option to either tie it around you with the knot in front or tie it in the back, with the long tie strings hanging down the back.

One size

name: Daisy Mae dress
description: What a breath of fresh Spring air this dress is! With a sunny yellow disposition and embroidered daisies galore, the Daisy Mae dress will have you frolicking through meadows and singing songs from The Sound Of Music. This dress is a lovely mix of 1930s and '40s details. The bodice itself is based on a 1937 pattern, featuring puff sleeves, shoulder pleats, a v-neck, soft gathering under the bust and a fitted waistband. The skirt has two patch pockets, gloriously decorated with sweet embroidered daisies. There is also three bands of shirring in the centre panel - front and back, giving additional fullness and movement, whilst keeping that extra fabric away from the sides/hips. Made from that very 1930s fabric, rayon, this dress wears and drapes beautifully and has a side-zipper opening, reminiscent of 1940s dresses. Sizes: A size - B to 98cm W75cm B size - B to 107cm W79cm C size - B to 110.5cm W81cm D size - B to 115.5cm W87.5cm

name: Fanback bustle skirt
description: There was a time in history when the bustle almost exclusively dominated women's fashion and by the late-1880s it had reached absurd proportions, creating an actual back shelf... This, is NOT that skirt! Of much more rational proportions, this lovely skirt has a pleated fanback and a side zipper and button closure. The fan section has two box pleats on each side with the middle two starting out at 4cm and fanning out to 20cm at the hem. It has a lovely swish to it when you move, but looks like a slightly A-line pencil skirt from the front. Made of a polished cotton, it also has a little spandex in it for stretch... so a little stretch, a little sheen but not too much of either. Sizes: A size - W66cm H99cm B size - W73cm H107cm C size - W78cm H111cm D size - W82cm H115cm

name: Honey dress
description: The Honey dress has it all - flattering features, great construction, and just the right amount of stretch... and POCKETS! Made of a great stretch poplin, the Honey dress features a fitted bodice with a gathered bust that is framed by a ribbon of fabric that travels over the shoulder straps to a pointed collar in the back. It has a side zipper and a pocket in both side seams and the full circle skirt hits most just below the knee. 97% cotton, 3% spandex Sizes: A size - B93cm W69cm H free B size - B101cm W76cm H free C size - B107cm W84cm H free D size - B115cm W92cm H free The bust of this dress is quite accommodating and can fit a range of sizes. If you have any questions, please contact us at info@crimsongardenia.com before ordering.

name: Red Roses Patio dress
description: Made of the same soft cotton voile as the Honey Baby dress, the Red Roses Patio dress has some lovely features. A softly gathered bust is highlighted by the rounded neckline and straps which have a red contrast piping edge and a cute little cutout section. The 12cm-wide waistband is in the same red contrast... and also has piping! The Patio dress has a just-above-the-knee-length, slightly A-line skirt, which is fully lined with a second skirt of plain white cotton voile, and has a back zipper. Sizes: A size B89cm W69cm H free B size B97cm W77cm H free C size B104cm W84cm H free There are other sizes available in the Patio dress - contact us if you are interested in having another size ordered in for you.

name: High-Waisted 1940s skirt
description: The perfect skirt for channelling your inner bombshell. Team it with an off-the-shoulder peasant blouse for that Jane Russell look or crinoline it up for some skirt-swishing fun. A lovely high-waistband is the feature of this skirt, measuring a nice tall 9cm at the centre front, slimming down to 7cm on the sides and further thinning to 5.5cm at the back, giving it a lovely curve when viewed from the side. A clever styling trick that this skirt also serves up is that all of the lovely gathers, which give the skirt its volume, are at the front and back - they are kept entirely away from the sides, an area few of us need extra fabric! But my favourite feature... POCKETS!! One in each side seam. Closes with a long centre back zipper with a metal pull and is further secured with a hook and eye closure above the zipper. Skirt hits just below the knee on most. Sizes: A size - W67cm B size - W71cm C size - W75cm D size - W79cm E size - W87cm

name: Honey Baby Roses dress
description: A real showstopper of a dress. The Honey Baby Roses dress features a red contrast bodice and skirt, with a gorgeous red roses print for the bust, collar and in the skirt pleat. Made of a lovely cotton voile, the dress is fully lined and the skirt lining is a full second skirt... similar to a petticoat feel. And did we mention the pockets? Yes, POCKETS! :-) A beautifully versatile dress, the style and colour lends itself to a night time event but the lovely light material means that a gal with moxie could definitely wear this as a day dress... if she's prepared for the looks she'll gather! The bustline has some give and take, so make sure you order this dress according to your waist measurements. Sizes A size - B to 92cm W to 68cm B size - B to 96cm W to 72cm C size - B to 100cm W to 76cm

name: Cherry Tree Lane Dress
description: Oh Spring... here you are in dress form! The Cherry Tree Lane dress is 100% cotton and 100% Spring! With lots (and lots) of material in the skirt (pictured without any petticoats!), this dress has a lovely movement to it... it's designed for a frolic! Flowering cherry trees, a border of pink tulips and purple irises, a decorative bird bath, a garden seat and blue, blue skies, this dress has it all! Including pockets! Yes, pockets in the side seams. That makes me dance with joy! Sizes A size - B86.3cm W66cm B size - SOLD OUT C size - SOLD OUT

name: Rose dress
description: The Rose dress is a 1940s dream come to life! A soft pink background, scattered with feathers, gloves, masks and bows, this dress features contrasting black epaulettes and waistband. Similar to the Frenchie dress, the waistband on the Rose dress starts out at 7.5cm in the centre, thinning out to 6cm on the sides... love a bit of illusion in the waist area! The 3/4 sleeves, slightly longer than elbow-length, have a band of shirring down the centre, causing a beautiful gathering effect. A lovely touch, reminiscent of late-1930s styling. The length generally hits just below the knee. Sizes: A size - B91cm W68cm H most B size - B101cm W73cm H most C size - B106cm W75cm H most

name: Frenchie Halter dress
description: A fun and flirty dress, the Frenchie Halter dress is a brilliant combination of features. The bustline is elasticated and gathered, with a band of material running underneath this section for a little extra support, which then joins up with the halter straps, giving the illusion of a continuous ribbon of material. The 100% cotton material is of a black background with pink & fuchsia and cream & green peony roses with sprigs of green maidenhair fern. A lovely full skirt, with hidden sideseam pockets, the dress is just on knee length and has a long back zipper opening. Made in the USA. Sizes: A size - SOLD OUT B size - SOLD OUT C size - B96.5cm W76cm D size - B101.5cm W81cm Please note: the manufacturer has decided to discontinue this dress so sadly we cannot reorder. What we have left is all that is left...

name: Cherry bracelet
description: Another item in the Cherry Collection, this bracelet makes the loveliest tinkling noise as the five cherries and their leaves on the 20cm chain move with your every hand gesture. I'll freely admit it, I'm a sucker for jewellery that makes a noise, and this is one of the nicest I've found. It has a beautiful weight to it – enough not to look or feel cheap, but not enough to be cumbersome and inconvenient. Just right as they say in the advertising world! Made in the USA. Size: ~ 20cm chain length

name: Swallow brooch
description: The bluebird of happiness... yes, we know it's a swallow but it makes us smile every time! Pin this on your lapel for an instant pick-me-up of sunshine. Crafted of high quality poly-resin, our swooping swallows will land in your postbox for $23.00 Made in the USA. Size: ~ 7cm – wing tip to wing tip

name: Two-Tone Flower brooch
description: This lovely brooch features two 5-petal flowers with a sparkly rhinestone in the middle. The outer petals are a deep jade colour, while the inside petals are a light, almost translucent blue-green. There is a beautiful vintage-feel to this brooch. Made in the USA. Size: ~ 4.5cm – diameter Colours: Jade green /light green-blue

name: Belle jeans
description: Have you been looking for a high-waisted pair of slim fitting jeans that are both comfortable AND flattering? Look no more - you have been searching for the Belle jeans... and you've found them! Made of a light-weight stretch cotton/elastane mix, the Belle blue jeans are chock full of flattering features. Copper is the highlight colour of the Belles; the rivets on the pockets are copper, the stitching is copper coloured and the button is copper. The two back pockets are both situated nice and high, avoiding that 'too low = big bum' look that far too many jeans are guilty of. The leg length is on the shorter side, giving them a carefree capri feel. Maybe that is why they make me think of Grace Kelly and Audrey Hepburn... Size A size - W66cm H91cm B size - W71cm H96cm C size - W76cm H101cm The Belle jeans are available in other sizes, so please contact us if you would like to have a pair ordered in for you.

name: The Henrietta coat-dress
description: How fabulous is this coat!?! Able to be worn as either a button through dress or a swish coat, The Henrietta is one versatile piece. It comes with a beautifully long sash tie, it has a stand up collar and pointed cuffs and is made of a crisp cotton. Add a petticoat to this little number and va-va-voom... scenes reminiscent of Christian Dior's New Look - but without the need for waist-cinching corsetry. Made in the USA. Size: A size - B81cm W60cm H87cm B size - B89cm W66cm H91cm C size - B91cm W72cm H96cm D size - SOLD OUT The manufacturer has now discontinued this item, so we sadly won't be restocking.

name: Bernie Dungaree blue jeans
description: No longer available from the manufacturer... once these are gone, sadly they are gone. Possibly the most comfortable - yet stylish! - jeans you will ever own. Say goodbye to plumbers cleavage forever! Based on Bernie Dexter's own vintage collection with modern updates, the Dungaree blue jeans are a high-waist, relaxed fit and feel... and did I mention 'comfortable'? Dress them up with heels or kick around in jeans with the hems rolled up, the Dungaree works in both situations. Made of 98% organic cotton with 2% spandex for stretch, there will be some shrinkage - but mainly in the leg length. They feature a metal side zipper for that authentic vintage feel and a pewter-coloured metal button with a lucky horseshoe on it. Two darts in the front and four in the back ensure a nice, smooth fit to your torso. No belt loops. Made in the USA. Size A size - W66cm H91cm B size - W71cm H96cm C size - W76cm H101cm

name: Frida Blossom top
description: Call it a gypsy blouse, call it a peasant top... just make sure you call it cute! In 100% cotton with elasticized neckline and sleeves, the Frida top can be both demure and sassy - just choose how you wear it... on or off the shoulder, with a pencil skirt or a dirndl skirt. No buttons or zippers, this top slips over your head, so is quite roomy in the torso - simply tuck in or add a belt for a fitted look or leave it untucked for a less structured look. Sizes: A size - SOLD OUT B size - B91-101cm W71-81cm H96-106cm C size - B96-106cm W76-86cm H101-111cm D size - B101-111cm W81-91cm H101-111cm The manufacturer has discontinued this style, so we will not be restocking.

name: The Grable top
description: This top has been discontinued... what we have, is all that's left of this cutie Don't you love a puff sleeve? Most of the Disney princesses seem to, as did Ms Eliza Bennett... and so then presumably did Mr Darcy! This flattering top is made of a cotton/spandex mix - it has great stretch and, more importantly, bounceback. Cut to fall to your natural waistline, the Grable is perfect for a high-waisted skirt or pants, hence no hips listing in the sizes... it is not going to reach your hips. Made in the USA. Size: A size - B80cm W60cm B size - B88cm W66cm C size - SOLD OUT D size - B96cm W76cm

name: Rose stockings
description: Gorgeous sheer black stockings with a woven floral top. A beautiful red rose with trailing green leaves are the highlight of these delightful stockings. They have a scalloped edge at the top of the floral border, which are designed to hit at mid-thigh height. They are a nylon/spandex/polyester mix and as there is no silicone in the tops you will definitely need to use a garter belt with them... or try the Garter shorts we have in the Lingerie department. Size: One size ~ approx size 8 to 16 will fit these stockings.

name: Ahoy Sailor coat
description: You'll look super-sharp in this sailor-inspired short coat. Fully-lined, this warm and fuzzy navy-coloured coat features double white banding on the cuffs, a single band around the collar and four woven buttons. This double-breasted coat also has two pockets to keep your fingers toasty (or to stash your bosun's whistle) and it comes with a spare button... I can see that button turned into a very nifty brooch with a little DIY craftiness. Cut to sit just above your hips, it has a slightly fitted waist (only slightly), which then flares out to follow the line of your hips. Size: A size - B86cm W68cm H free B size - SOLD OUT C size - B97cm W76cm H free

name: Little Bows blouse
description: What do you get when you add a peplum with an explosion of ice-pink and white bows with a sprinkle of matching pink bow buttons? You get the Little Bows blouse! A deep sweetheart neckline makes the most of your decolletage, whilst a beautifully long, fluttering peplum sits just across the top of your derriere. You will need to wear a high waisted skirt or pants with this blouse as the last button on its pink background sits just on your natural waistline... unless, of course, you are OK with having your midriff on show. ;-) Size: A size - B86cm W66cm H free B size - B91cm W71cm H free C size - SOLD OUT

name: Pretty Peacock blouse
description: Definitely one to be worn with a black or beige chemise, the Pretty Peacock blouse is as light and airy as a feather. A filmy, floaty number, this blouse features a standup collar, soft shawl lapels, five metal flower-like buttons down the front and two on each of the sleeve cuffs. A black chiffon-weight material features cream and pink printed peacock feathers all over. Sizes: A size - SOLD OUT B size - B97cm W76cm H104cm C size- B102cm W81cm H109cm

name: Corporal Cutie shirt
description: Was $45, now only $22! I need the space that the Cuties are taking up to devote to some beautiful new spring dresses, so these are now at rock bottom price. There are only a few of each size left, and only 1 in the olive, so order yours today. You'll be fit to review the troupes in this military-inspired shirt. Corporal Cutie is available in two colours - taupe and olive - and both come with the added bonus of a coordinating tie. Please note, the Olive Corporal Cutie is pictured with the tie of the Taupe, just for colour comparison purposes. These shirts come with a tie of the same colour. Decorated with epaulets on your shoulders, stars on your lapels and wings on your buttons, the Corporal Cutie is perfect when teamed with a pencil skirt and seamed stockings - or dress it down with some cuffed jeans or even capri pants. Sizes: Medium - Bust: 91cm Waist: 71cm Hips: 99cm Large - Bust: 97cm Waist: 76cm Hips: 104cm XLarge - Bust: 102cm Waist: 83cm Hips: 109cm

name: Yellow satin evening dress
description: Wonderful quality vintage, this yellow satin dress has survived the years very well. A beautiful, lustrous satin, this dress positively glows! A rich, creamy yellow, it features small yellow leaves 3.5cm across and even smaller 1.5cm leaves scattered across the material. It has a self-covered belt and knotted belt loops on each side seam to hold it in place. The skirt is fully pleated and only has one single seam in the side. There is more than a full circle of material... it would look amazing with a petticoat underneath it. There are no tags in the dress but if this is a homemade dress, then it has been made impeccably. The inside seams are flawless! Size: Sizes are measured with the dress laid flat. The best way to work out your measurements is to take a piece of clothing that you already own and take similar measurements from it. Bust - measured from underarm seam to underarm seam - 42cm. This dress will have some leeway in the bust area due to the ruching in the bust cups - plenty of stretch and give there. Waist - 33cm across. Hips - free If you have any questions about this dress or would like other measurements, please contact us at info@crimsongardenia.com

name: Blue tulle ballgown
description: A stunning dress, I have actually never worn this one... it was more of a vintage rescue dress... "I just can't leave this dress here in amongst all these smelly old clothes..." A true beauty, this dress has the softest tulle I have ever had the good fortune to touch. The bottom layer is a soft blue satin, the next a larger holed darker blue tulle, the next a lighter blue with smaller holes and the top layer is the sky blue, light-as-a-feather tulle. The top layer does have a couple of small holes in it - I guess you don't survive that many years without a few war wounds - but with the swirling layers and folds you don't notice them. The third layer also has war wound, with a previous owner having some kind of accident which has lead to a semi-circle being cut out - but again, underneath two layers of tulle you don't notice it overly much. The zipper will need to be replaced on this dress as the little tag to close it has long since gone. It also has two big flowers attached to the rear of the dress from which one long ribbon of fabric is attached, the mid-point of which has another flower attached. As you can see from the pictures, I've never been completely sure what to do with this embellishment, but I always thought it would look lovely attached to the wrist. So, she isn't flawless, but she is lovely. A real star. Size: Sizes are measured with the dress laid flat. The best way to work out your measurements is to take a piece of clothing that you already own and take similar measurements from it. Bust - measured from underarm seam to underarm seam - 46cm. Waist - 30cm across. Hips - free Total length from shoulder top to bottom hem - 146cm If you have any questions about this dress or would like other measurements or pictures, please contact us at info@crimsongardenia.com

name: The Gal With The Dragon Tattoo hose
description: Nope, I haven't read the book but the name was just too appropriate. The pantyhose for those that always wanted a tattoo but who, for one reason or another, couldn't make the commitment... we give you The Gal With The Dragon Tattoo pantyhose. Black nylon pantyhose with the fabulous surprise of a black flock dragon with two tiny rhinestone eyes on each leg. Size: One size ~ approx size 8 to 14 will fit these pantyhose

name: Blooming Lovely Lace pantyhose
description:
Gorgeous blooming flowers, a portrait in lace.

These pantyhose are 90% nylon, 10% spandex and 100% lovely.

Want to jazz up an outfit? Try wearing them over the top of a solid colour pantyhose that coordinates with your outfit, or use them to add colour to a solid black ensemble.

Size: One size ~ approx size 8 to 14 will fit these pantyhose

Colour: black

name: Very Seamly pantyhose
description: The finishing touch to any vintage look, these stockings definitely catch the eye! Back seams run all the way from the toe to the waistband so you can wear your skirts as short as you like. Please note: these pantyhose do NOT feature a cuban heel. Size: One size ~ approx size 8 to 14 will fit these pantyhose. Colours: Nude seam/nude hose - available now Black seam/black hose - coming soon

name: Very Seamly stockinghose
description: What is stockinghose, you ask? In all reality, I think it may be a word that I just made up to describe these pantyhose that think they are stockings. Nude pantyhose with a sexy black backseam that come with their own attached garter belt. That's what I call stockinghose. A wide band of stretch lace acts as your garter belt, with four thinner lace straps attached to the hose. All the convenience of pantyhose combined with the slink of stockings! Seamed stockings at that! Also available in nude with nude seam. Black with black seam coming soon. 100% nylon. Tragically, Louboutins are not included :-( Size: One size ~ approx size 8 to 14 will fit these pantyhose... err stockinghose

name: Fishnet Suspender Hose
description: Love your fishnet stockings... but don't like the fiddliness of stockings? Alternatively, love the ease of pantyhose but prefer the breeze of stockings? I think we've found the solution! These fishnets are the one-piece of pantyhose, but have strategically cut out sections to also give you that stocking feel. Limited numbers of these clever pieces, so if you want them, get in now! Size: One size ~ approx size 8 to 14 will fit these pantyhose Plus size ~ approx size 14 to 20 will fit these pantyhose The colour/size combinations listed are all that is available at the moment.

name: Stockingly Sheer stockings
description: Sheer stockings, for that quick flash of garters. 100% nylon stockings. No silicone tops so do require garters to hold them up. Size: One size ~ approx size 8 to 16 will fit these stockings The colour/size combinations listed are all that is available for the moment.

name: Sheerly You Jest pantyhose
description: Perfect for short skirts - or those that fly up when you are dancing up a storm - these sheer to waist pantyhose have no darker 'shorts' area around your hips. It's all sheer baby! These pantyhose are 85% nylon and 15% spandex for that lovely stretch and support feeling. Size: One size ~ approx size 8 to 14 will fit these pantyhose Colours: Black Honey Beige

name: Snap Snap Triple-Snap leggings
description: Whilst I don't think leggings strictly fit into the "vintage style" category, these ones in particular definitely have elements of cool. They feature three silver "snap" buttons on a cuff, giving them a tuxedo look. They are seamless and are a 90% nylon, 10% spandex mix. They have a nice thick feel to them, without being woolly or bulky. Perfect for wearing under a short skirt to your next dance workshop. Pretty and functional! But we still subscribe to the "leggings are not pants" philosophy... Size: One size ~ approx size 8 to 14 will fit these pantyhose * Snap buttons are non-functional

name: Footloose & Fancy lace footless tights
description: Footless tights! With lace! Nice thick, opaque tights with a 5cm border of scallop-edged floral lace. Perfect for your next swing dancing foray or when you just want a bit of extra warmth under your skirt. Size: One size ~ size 8 to 14 will fit these tights.

name: High-Waisted Shaper
description: A super high-waisted shaper to smooth your silhouette and give your clothing some slip. Giving light control from your hip to under the bustline, this shaper allows your clothing to slide over your curves without catching, helping to hide the bits you don't want to draw attention to, not highlight them. No riding up No rolling down No front, back or side seams No tags Made of a nylon/elastane mix with a cotton gusset, this shaper is somehow super soft but also holds you in AND remains comfortable. The material is so nice and firm that it has the added advantage of helping to hide any unsightly seams that you may get from your pantyhose (if, of course, you go pantyhose under knickers!). Sizes: Small - size 8-10. W 65-74cm. H 90-99cm Medium - size 12-14. W 75-84cm. H 100-109cm Large - size 16-18. W 85-94cm. H 110-119cm The designer (who is a fellow Melbournian!) recommends that tall girls/long torso girls go up one size so that the shaper does come up to just under your bustline. Comes in nude in all sizes and black in medium only. "Oh wow! These are nicer than the ones I have - and I paid $70 for them!" - customer quote

name: Garter boyleg shorts
description:
A great idea for the lass who likes stockings but doesn't want the extra bumps of a garter belt.

This knickers have four garter straps sewn to the leg hems - two in the front, two in the back.

The button & slide clasps are hidden by a black satin ribbon, giving you that authentic vintage look and the straps are adjustable.

A lot of lingerie pictures have stockings pulled up way too high, almost up to the top of the thigh. In reality most stockings are designed to reach to the mid-thigh. These garter straps will allow that.

If you have purchased some stay-up thigh-highs, you can shorten the garter straps on these and attach them for that bit of extra security.

These come in two sizes; small/medium and medium/large.

Please note, the photographs shows a silver clip at the top of the straps that would allow the garter straps to slide off for washing but these pants do NOT come with that clip. Each garter strap is sewn onto the hem of the pants.

Either handwash or pop them into a lingerie bag before washing.

name: Seamless shorts
description:
Whilst not actually shorts (we certainly wouldn't recommend them as outerwear!), these knickers are seamless.

No front, no back, no side seams. Perfect for wearing with your pencil skirt or pin-up dress where an VPL would ruin the look... let's face it though, the VPL is not going to be a good look at any time!

Made of a mixture of nylon and spandex, these knickers are soft and have an amazing amount of stretch which is why there is only one size.

If you are between a size 8 and 16, these will fit you.

name: Dorothy hair clips
description: Channeling the little gal from Kansas, these satin and gingham bows are the first word in cute. Featuring a little black Scottie dog with a red bow around his neck, these blue bows are attached to a silver slide clip. A light blue satin bow forms the base, with a smaller, darker blue and white gingham bow on top. Comes in a pack of two... in case you are inspired to do the full Dorothy pigtails look. Size: ~ 12cm wide, 7cm at the tallest part and 2cm in the middle Colour: Blue satin, blue & white gingham and black Scottie dog with red bow on silver clips Price: $16.50 for two

name: Cherry earrings
description: Gorgeous cherry and leaf earrings to brighten your day and your outfit. Hypoallergenic, these earrings are made of silver-plated pewter with delightfully carved cherries and leaves and they have a hook and lever-back closure for added security. Made in the USA. Size: ~ 4.5cm drop - top of hook to the bottom of the cherry Colours: Cherry & jade green

name: Floral Carved bangle
description: Very popular during the 1950s, carved bangles can finish off an outfit perfectly. The colours we have for you – a delicious, warm tortoiseshell, beautiful black and nifty navy - will coordinate with most outfits and multiples clicking together will have you sounding as good as you look. Made in the USA. Size: ~ 6.5cm – inside diameter Colours: Tortoiseshell Navy Black

name: Scottie Dog brooch
description: Although it was always Fred Basset's name that took the headline spot in the comic strips, we always preferred his little mate, Jock, the Scottie dog. The “it dog” of the 1930s, stars such as Bette Davis, Dorothy Lamour, Humphrey Bogart and Shirley Temple all owned a Scottie. This lead to such a rise in popularity of the pooches that you then saw their image everywhere, including jewellery and even one of the playing pieces on the Monopoly board. So, here is your very own version, for just $23.00. Can't you just see him, snuggled on the lapel of your winter coat? Or perched jauntily atop a beret or in the folds of a woollen scarf – preferably plaid... Made in the USA. Size: ~ 5.5cm - nose to tail Colours: Black with ivory highlights Black

name: Seahorse brooch
description: This reminds us of those gorgeously pink Mamie Einsenhower bathrooms... can't you see this little guy on the shower curtain of a 1950s bathroom? He is cute as a button and will look ideal swimming next to your jacket buttons. Adopt him for $23. Made in the USA. Size: ~ 7cm tall

name: Rose brooch
description: One of the reasons that plastic jewellery was so popular in the 1930s was because Bakelite and Catalin were seen as exciting and new (even though Bakelite was invented in 1905). Whilst our rose brooches aren't ye olde timey Bakelite, they are hand-poured and their lovely high-gloss finish is achieved by a 5-day tumbling process. This is jewellery made with love! Made in the USA. Size: ~ 5cm - diameter Colours: Red Jade green

name: Cherry brooch
description: This cherry brooch is awesome! Three cherries and leaves, dangling by silver chains from a red floral bar. Although cherries are seen as a 1950s fashion icon, they actually weren't that popular back then, so this is deliciously retro and up-to-the-minute stylish at the same time. Made in the USA. Size: ~ 5.5cm – point to point of the floral bar

name: Scottie Dog bracelet
description: Jock on a chain! Take the pooch for a walk and look stylish doing it. An adorable little black Scottish Terrier is attached to your bracelet by his own silver chain collar. Don't leave him hanging though... order him today and make him your own. Made in the USA. Size: ~ 20cm chain length. Scottie – ~ 4cm nose to tail

name: Rose Stud earrings
description: Beautifully carved roses for your ears. They may not have the perfume, but they sure do have the look. Silver-plated posts with bullet clutch backings. Made in the USA. Size: ~ 2cm diameter Colours: Black Red

name: Large Hoop earrings
description: Fun, bright red hoops, with a carved line running around each side are an easy way to jazz up an outfit. Match them with your shoes or handbag or a red flower in your hair to add the finishing touch. Silver-plated posts with bullet clutch backings. Made in the USA. Size: ~ 4cm – outside edge diameter

name: Go-Go Hoop earrings
description: You don't have to be a go-go dancer to appreciate these lovelies. Of course you definitely CAN put on a pair of knee-length boots and do the pony, but you can also pair them with less '60s outfits. A translucent jade-green hoop dangles and spins from silver links that carry a single, lighter hued jade-coloured ball, all on a silver-plated pewter hook with a lever-back closure. Made in the USA. Size: ~ 5.5cm – top of silver hoop to bottom of jade hoop
